## Return Value

The lowest index whose corresponding value is equal to `anObject`. Objects are considered equal if they have the same id or if `isEqual:` returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. If none of the objects in the combo box’s internal item list is equal to `anObject`, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboBoxCell/indexOfItem(withObjectValue:)] returns `NSNotFound`.

This method logs a warning if [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboBoxCell/usesDataSource] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

# indexOfItem(withObjectValue:)

**Instance Method**

Searches the combo box’s internal item list for the given object and returns the matching index number.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func indexOfItem(withObjectValue object: Any) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **object**: The object for which to return the index.

## Return Value

The lowest index whose corresponding value is equal to `anObject`. Objects are considered equal if they have the same id or if `isEqual:` returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. If none of the objects in the combo box’s internal item list is equal to `anObject`, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboBoxCell/indexOfItem(withObjectValue:)] returns `NSNotFound`.

## Discussion

This method logs a warning if [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboBoxCell/usesDataSource] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Related Documentation

- **selectItem(withObjectValue:)**: Selects the first pop-up list item that corresponds to the specified object.

## Manipulating the Displayed List

- **itemObjectValue(at:)**: Returns the object located at the specified location in the internal item list.
- **noteNumberOfItemsChanged()**: Informs the combo box that the number of items in its data source has changed.
- **reloadData()**: Marks the combo box as needing redisplay, so that it will reload the data for visible pop-up items and draw the new values.
- **scrollItemAtIndexToTop(_:)**: Scrolls the combo box’s pop-up list vertically so that the item at the given index is as close to the top as possible.
- **scrollItemAtIndexToVisible(_:)**: Scrolls the combo box’s pop-up list vertically so that the item at the given index is visible.
